trash.confirmDescription: Properties will be moved to the bin and automatically deleted after 14 days. You can restore them from the bin before then.

trash.countMessage: You are about to move {{count}} {{properties}} to the bin.
trash.successDescription: Properties will be permanently deleted after 14 days
trash.errorDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
trash.title: Property Bin
trash.trashExpiryWarning: Properties in the bin will be permanently deleted after 14 days
trash.emptyTrashDescription: Items moved to the bin will appear here for 14 days before being permanently deleted
trash.restoreDescription: Restore properties from the bin to your active listings.
trash.restoreCountMessage_one: You are about to restore {{count}} property.
trash.restoreCountMessage_other: You are about to restore {{count}} properties.
trash.deleteForeverDescription: This action cannot be undone. The properties will be permanently deleted.
trash.deleteForeverCountMessage_one: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} property.
trash.deleteForeverCountMessage_other: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} properties.

trash.emptyTrashCountMessage_one: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} property from the bin.
trash.emptyTrashCountMessage_other: You are about to permanently delete {{count}} properties from the bin.

trash.deleteSuccessDescription: The selected properties have been permanently removed
trash.emptySuccessDescription: All properties in the bin have been permanently deleted

plans.title: Choose Your Plan

basic.name: Basic

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: For estate agents and property managers

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For estate agencies and large businesses

status.title: Subscribe
status.basicMessage: You're currently on the Basic plan. Upgrade to access premium features like bulk uploads, analytics, and more.
status.errorMessage: There was a problem setting up the payment process. Please try again later.
status.activeMessage: Your subscription is active and will automatically renew on {{date}}.
status.canceledMessage: The subscription feature is currently unavailable. Please check back later.
status.paymentIssueMessage: There was a problem with your last payment. Please update your payment method.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards and payment providers.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: Refunds are available according to our refund policy. Please contact support for details.

teamDiscount.question: Is there a discount for teams?
teamDiscount.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for teams and agencies. Contact sales for more information.

verification.title: Verification
verification.description: Verify your account to access exclusive features and build trust with other users
verification.start_description: Complete your verification to unlock premium features and build credibility
verification.user_type_description: Verify as an individual user to access personal features
verification.agency_type_description: Verify as an agency or business for professional features
verification.help_description: If you have questions about the verification process, we're here to help
verification.verification_in_progress: Your verification is currently being processed
verification.verification_timeline: We'll review your documents within 1-2 business days
verification.verification_not_started: You haven't started the verification process yet
verification.verification_help_description: If you have questions about verification, view our guide or contact support.
verification.start_verification_description: Begin the process to verify your account.
verification.agency_verification_short_desc: Verify as an agency or business.
verification.verification_guide_description: Learn about the verification process, requirements, and FAQs.
verification.verification_benefits_description: Get verified to access exclusive features and build credibility
verification.verification_process_description: Complete the verification process to unlock premium features and build trust with potential clients
verification.user_verification_guide_description: Follow these steps to complete your verification
verification.document_clear_legible: Documents must be clear and legible
verification.document_complete_visible: All information must be complete and visible
verification.didit_secure_description: Your data is protected with bank-level security
verification.agency_verification_guide_description: Complete these steps to verify your agency
verification.business_document_official: Documents must be official and valid
verification.business_document_valid: All licences must be current and valid
verification.business_document_complete: All required information must be included
verification.business_document_contact_info: Contact information must be clearly visible
verification.verification_faq_description: Common questions about the verification process
verification.faq_required_answer: Verification helps build trust and ensures platform security
verification.faq_time_answer: Digital verification takes minutes, manual verification 1-2 business days
verification.faq_security_answer: Yes, we use bank-level security to protect your data
verification.faq_rejection: What if my verification is rejected?
verification.faq_rejection_answer: You'll receive detailed feedback and can resubmit
verification.faq_both_types: Do I need both types of verification?
verification.faq_both_types_answer: No, you can choose either digital or manual verification
verification.need_help_description: Our support team is here to assist you
verification.reviewDocumentDetails: Review the submitted documents and user information
verification.confirmVerificationDescription: Are you sure you want to approve this verification request? This action cannot be undone.
verification.verificationSuccessDesc: The verification request has been approved successfully
verification.genericError: An error occurred while processing the verification
verification.noPermissionMessage: You don't have permission to access this area
verification.digital_verification_description: Verify your identity quickly and securely using our digital verification system
verification.didit_redirect_notice: You will be redirected to our secure verification partner
verification.benefit_priority_description: Get faster response times and dedicated support
verification.benefit_credibility_description: Build trust with potential clients and partners
verification.verification_guide_subtitle: Learn how to get verified on our platform
verification.verification_guide_success_message: Your verification has been completed successfully
verification.verification_guide_error_message: There was an error processing your verification

form.agency_description: Verify as an agency or business

verification.verification_users_description: Verify your identity to access exclusive features and build credibility
verification.manual_verification_description: Upload your documents for manual verification by our team
verification.id_document_hint: Upload a clear photo of your government-issued ID (passport, driver's licence, or national ID)
verification.proof_of_address_hint: Upload a recent utility bill, bank statement, or official letter (not older than 3 months)
verification.notes_hint: Add any relevant information that might help with the verification process
verification.business_registration_hint: Upload your official business registration certificate or company formation documents
verification.real_estate_license_hint: Upload your valid real estate licence or professional certification
verification.business_address_hint: Upload a recent utility bill or official document showing your business address (not older than 3 months)
verification.notes_placeholder: Add any additional information that might help with the verification process...
verification.benefit_trust_description: Build trust with potential clients and partners by verifying your identity
verification.step_choose_type_description: Select whether you want to verify as an individual user or as a business or agency
verification.step_select_method_description: Choose between digital verification (fast) or manual verification (document upload)
verification.step_submit_documents_description: Upload the required documents based on your verification type and method
verification.step_review_approval_description: We will review your submission and notify you of the result.
